resources.string: Known as the Lake District.It shines as a glittering jewel in the Himalayan Mountains and is surrounded with lakes and nature\'s bounty.
Auli is considered among the best skiing destinations of India, it is situated in Chamoli district covering an elevation of 3,050 mts above sea level
The hill station is Ranikhet, literally meaning - Queens Land. Ranikhet is a place that reflects the best of the great Himalayas.
Kausani is known for offering a panoramic view of the massive Himalayan peaks such as Trishul, Nanda Devi
Located at an average elevation of 1,514 meters above sea level, Pithoragarh is a Himalayan town famous for it\'s heavenly beauty
As the name suggest Chaukori ia tiny hamlet shaped like bowl that is enveloped in the heart of Himalaya
The muse of a romantic, a loner’s wonderland and a nature lover’s paradise
Lies amidst the majestic snow-capped Himalayan ranges on the banks of river Mandakini
Perched at an average elevation of 3,300 metres.The town of Badrinath lies between Nar and Narayan mountain ranges
Gangotri is a town centered around the temple of Gangotri it is belived that this is the place where river Ganga descended from heaven
Located at a height of 3293 metre above sea level this temple is dedicated to Goddess Yamuna
Devprayag is the last Prayag of the Alaknanda River positioned at an elevation of 830 meters above sea level.
Revered as one among seven holiest places of India , Haridwar literally suggests the \'Gateway to Lord Vishnu\'
Situated at an elevation of 1317 mts above sea level revered as the home of Lord Kedarnath during winters.
The celestial city of Rishikesh is a hermit’s hermitage, a sage’s abode The word Rishikesh literally suggests the \'locks or hairs of a sage\'
Adi Kailash also referred to as Chota Kailash or Little Kailash situated in the Indian Territory in Pithoragarh district
Taste the famous blend of green leafy vegetables in the form of Kafuli
Kumaoni Dal Bade are crispy, flavoursome, gluten free urad dal fritters
A side dish prepared from curd, turmeric, grated cucumber, green chillies and mustard seeds, this raita can be had with just about everything
These delicious and nutritious chapatis are made from Mandua Flour (Finger
Gahat ka paratha is healthy and nutritious paratha stuffed with horse gram.
Singhals are part and parcel of Kumaon culture, a healthy delicacy made with semolina, banana, curd, milk, sugar, and cardamom.
A combination of different lentils like arhar, moong and urad soaked overnight, is what gives a unique taste to this complex dish
This is a sweetmeat moulded in an indigenous leaf called malla ka patta that results in little cones fragrant with the elusive scent of cardamom
This very traditional Kumaoni recipe is made of lentils, either bhatt, gehat or arhar, which are boiled and later separated from the stock.
Gulgula is a delectable sweet of Uttarakhand. It is a sweet local snack made of jaggery which traces its origin to the Garhwal region.
A trekker’s delight and rookie’s rite of passage,at a towering peak of 3800 meters,Kedarkantha is located in Govind Wildlife Sancttuary
Kedartal also known as ‘Shiva’s Lake’ is one of the highest lakes(4912) metres above sea level in Uttarkashi district.
Situated in the mesmerizing Kumaon Himalayas, Pindari Glacier is a most accessible of all glacier treks
Also known as Switzeerland of Uttrakhand Chopta is a evergreen forest area which is a part of kedarnath wildlife sanctuary
Devariyatal is an emerald lake perched at a height of 2438 mts above sea level , it falls under Kedarnath Musk Deer Wildlife Sanctuary .
Located at a distance of 15 km from Lakshman Jhula in Rishikesh, a small village named Mohan Chatti is a hotspot for bungee jumping in India.
The enticing city of Rishikesh hosts a range of rafting activities With Grade I to V rapids, this place is an ideal destination for both amateurs and professionals
Uttarakhand offers abundant operations for paragliding for those looking for the rush of flying paragliding flights are offered via specialists at Mukteshwar and Ranikhet.
Skiing is one of the most enthralling activities in Uttarakhand . The snow-covered mountain peaks of Auli are the best to experience this thrilling activity.
